## onPixelRatioChange() function

Create a listener that will fire a callback whenever the pixel ratio of the current window changes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function onPixelRatioChange(callback: (pixelRatio: number) => void, options?: OnPixelRatioChangeOptions): void;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description

callback


</td><td>

(pixelRatio: number) =&gt; void


</td><td>

The function called when the pixel ratio changes.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

[OnPixelRatioChangeOptions](./spank-my-dom.onpixelratiochangeoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An optional configuration object.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
